input.sentences: my friend and i decided to spend the day together and paint our faces .
we went to my fathers office and he was sleeping .
outside of the office the fields had become drenched with rain .
we watched a waterfall pour water in the trees .
we climbed to the top of one of the houses and got a shot of the sunset .
output.sentences: Those two nutballs are sneaking up on their dad at work.
Next they decided to visit the rice paddy.
And then they were off to the waterfalls.
